short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Protects your crypto wallet from phishing and scam transactions.
short.de: Das Sicherheitstool sch√ºtzt Sie vor Web3-Betr√ºgereien, indem es Transaktionen √ºberpr√ºft und Phishing-Websites erkennt

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Web3 Antivirus acts as a security layer when you make transactions with your crypto wallet or browse websites. It leverages transaction simulation and proactive phishing detection to warn you about any risks before you connect your wallet or sign anything. 

In Web3, it takes one wrong signature to lose all your crypto. Web3 Antivirus is a security browser extension that helps you understand exactly what you're signing and what happens if you approve. 

How it protects you:

üõ°Ô∏èTransaction analysis

Web3 Antivirus provides security against 60+ types of scam: honeypots, wallet drainers, malicious transactions, fake tokens, poisoning attacks, and more. 

Before you sign a transaction or connect your crypto wallet, W3A simulates the transaction to show the potential outcome and validates whether it's dangerous.

üõ°Crypto phishing protection

Phishing and impersonation are the most frequent scams in Web3. Web3 Antivirus offers proactive phishing protection and immediately alerts you if you‚Äôre heading to a phishing site.

üõ°Ô∏èRisky open approvals and wallet health dashboard

Maximize your wallet‚Äôs security. Revoke high-risk token approvals, review your web3 interactions, check other users‚Äô wallets before interacting with them‚Äîall in one place. 


***

üîêPrivacy
Web3 Antivirus doesn‚Äôt have access to your crypto wallet or assets and never asks for your seed phrase or other personal information.

üîç Transparency
This wallet security tool is open-source and we encourage users to check our GitHub repository:
https://github.com/web3-antivirus/chrome-extension 

Release notes v0.16

* Significant scam engine detection improvements
* Light and geek (degen) modes
* Share report results
* UI/UX enhancements

Release notes v0.15.4

* BNB Chain alpha support
* Scam ENS cases detection
* Improved detection of suspicious websites
* Real-time token liquidity assessment

------------------

Release notes v0.15

* Subscribe for real-time alerts and notifications directly from the dashboard.
* Enhanced algorithms for better detection of malicious signatures.
* Broadened threat detection capabilities with additional security detectors.
* Various bugs addressed and system performance enhanced.

------------------

Release notes v0.14

* Design and performance improvements

------------------

Release notes v0.13

* Enhanced WalletConnect transaction analysis.
* Detection of website-injected malicious smart contract code.
* Transaction analysis now 3x faster.
* Improved gas price evaluation algorithms.
* Expanded contract insights, highlighting attributes and risks.
* New activity charts for contract, token, and collection trades.
* Advanced analysis for proxy contracts and wash trading.
* Quicker balance calculations in the Dashboard.
* Upgraded design and notifications for an improved user experience.


------------------

Release notes v0.12

* Major extension redesign
* Refined risk display layout
* Detection of new risks: No DEX pair, Volatile token liquidity, and Token-draining transaction
* Enhanced risk detection & transaction simulations
* Fine-tuned calculation mechanism in Portfolio value and Value at risk widgets

------------------

Release notes v0.11

* View potential DEX token pairs
* Calculate buy/sell commissions
* Improved detection for contracts' custom white/blacklists
* Identification of new honeypot scams
* Spanish/English language switch
* Enhanced design and performance
* Real-time push notifications

------------------

Release notes v0.10

* New detects: direct transfer, phishing website, phishing contract, and phishing swap.
* Upgraded honeypot scam detection featuring details of different honeypot types.
* Identification of suspicious activities within addresses linked to the contract a user interacts with.
* Wallet Health feature showing the percentage of users with lower health scores.
* Quick tweet generation to share your Wallet Health score on Twitter.
* W3A Dashboard Help section clarifying all its features and available metrics.
* Whitelist improvements.
* Fine-tuning of detection mechanisms for better accuracy.
* UI/UX enhancements for more comfortable user experience and smooth navigation.

------------------

Release notes v0.9

* Introducing a new referral program that enables users to invite friends, climb the leaderboard, and win awards.
* Update to the Wallet health score that evaluates three key parameters: granted approvals for assets, exposure to poisoning attacks, and assets associated with wash trading.
* Improved detection of potential scams involving addresses that mimic a 0x0..00 address.
* Alerts for detected poisoning attacks on a user's wallet.
* Enhancements to detection mechanisms to achieve greater precision and accuracy.
* UI/UX improvements to make the extension more intuitive and user-friendly.


------------------

Release notes v0.8
* Extension redesign for more intuitive and engaging user experience
* Detection of scam tokens exploiting the original token‚Äôs address in their names
* Detection of a risk associated with the ability of contract owner to grant approvals to user‚Äôs tokens
* Report on contract‚Äôs involvement in suspicious activities, such as contract exploit or theft
* Possibility to revoke token approvals to dApps
* Upgraded list of project audit companies
* Bug fixes and enhanced extension performance

----------

Release notes v0.7

* Highly detailed wallet dashboard where you can search for any wallet address to check its portfolio value, value of compromised assets, activity, and more
* Overview of your activity: last transactions analysis, frequently used dApps, and phishing alert history
* Token approvals section where you can check which dApps have access to your assets
* Comprehensive history of transactions analysis featuring all the vital details such as tokens sent and received and transaction risk score
* Regularly updated alert history with risks elimination recommendations
* Gas overpayment estimation
* Fixed bugs and improved extension performance

----------

Release notes v0.6
* Fair NFT price estimates on Rarible, LooksRare, Golom, Foundation
* Fair bid estimates on Rarible, Foundation auctions
* OpenSea transaction details for NFT listings
* Fiat equivalent for token prices
* Enhanced blocklists & allowlists for site verification

----------

Release notes v0.5
* Honeypots and slippage detection
* Display of wash trading risks for tokens
* Alerts for requests to sign a message
* Trading cooldown warning
* Price breakdown for NFTs that one is about to grant access to
* Warning for contract‚Äôs ability to be paused, preventing users from making transactions
* Detection of contract‚Äôs ability to block transaction approval, preventing users from selling tokens
* Detection of a method that allows the contract owner to transfer user‚Äôs tokens
* Detection of a method that allows the contract owner to burn user‚Äôs tokens
* Support for Edge browser

Web3 Antivirus te protege del fraude criptogr√°fico al auditar transacciones y detectar sitios web de phishing. üõ°

En Web3, basta una sola firma para perder todo lo que posees. Esta extensi√≥n de seguridad Web3 para navegadores te ayuda a mantener seguros tus activos criptogr√°ficos frente a fraudes y drenadores de carteras.

C√≥mo te protege:

üîÑ An√°lisis de transacciones

Web3 Antivirus te alerta sobre trampas de miel, drenadores de carteras, transacciones maliciosas, patrones de trading de lavado, ataques de envenenamiento y m√°s.

Antes de que firmes una transacci√≥n o conectes tu cartera, W3A verifica los riesgos potenciales y simula la transacci√≥n para mostrar qu√© sucede si la apruebas. Ver√°s claramente lo que recibes y lo que entregas como resultado de la transacci√≥n.

‚ö†Ô∏è Aprobaciones abiertas riesgosas y monitoreo de la salud de la cartera

Revoca aprobaciones de tokens de alto riesgo para dApps, revisa tus interacciones en Web3, verifica las carteras de otros usuarios antes de interactuar con ellos, todo en un solo lugar.

üé£ Protecci√≥n contra phishing e imitaci√≥n

El phishing y la imitaci√≥n son los fraudes m√°s comunes en Web3. Web3 Antivirus ofrece protecci√≥n proactiva contra phishing y te alerta inmediatamente si est√°s a punto de entrar a un sitio de phishing.

üîê Privacidad
Web3 Antivirus no tiene acceso a tu cartera ni a tus activos y nunca solicita tu frase semilla u otra informaci√≥n personal.

üîç Transparencia
Esta herramienta de seguridad para carteras es de c√≥digo abierto, y alentamos a los usuarios a revisar nuestro repositorio de GitHub:
https://github.com/web3-antivirus/chrome-extension

üß© Esta herramienta de seguridad Web3 actualmente soporta Ethereum y protege Metamask, Coinbase Wallet y BitKe

long.es:
En Web3, solo se necesita una firma para perder todo lo que posees. Web3 Antivirus es una herramienta de seguridad que te ayuda a mantener tus activos criptogr√°ficos a salvo de estafas y fraudes.

üõ°C√≥mo te protege:

1. An√°lisis de transacciones

Cuando est√°s a punto de firmar una transacci√≥n o un mensaje, Web3 Antivirus la retiene brevemente y analiza los riesgos potenciales. Detecta trampas, l√≥gica sospechosa, funciones peligrosas, permisos de acceso comprometedores para activos, patrones de comercio de lavado, ataques de envenenamiento y otras amenazas.

La extensi√≥n tambi√©n simula la transacci√≥n y muestra qu√© sucede si la apruebas. Claramente ver√°s lo que recibir√°s y lo que entregar√°s como resultado de la transacci√≥n.

En unos segundos, W3A resume todas las amenazas potenciales en un üö¶informe. Con toda la informaci√≥n en tu poder, puedes decidir si proceder o no.

2. Panel Personal

Tu Panel es un panel de control donde puedes monitorear tu actividad web3, revocar f√°cilmente las aprobaciones de tokens a dApps, y verificar las billeteras de otros usuarios antes de interactuar con ellos, todo en un solo lugar. Ahora tienes acceso a los datos m√°s recientes y puedes tomar decisiones bien informadas sobre la gesti√≥n y seguridad de tus activos.

3. Detecci√≥n de sitios web de phishing

Web3 Antivirus ofrece protecci√≥n proactiva contra el phishing. Comprueba los nombres de dominio contra su amplia base de datos de bloqueo utilizando validaci√≥n de similitud de IA, identifica contenido sospechoso e inmediatamente te alerta si te diriges a un sitio de phishing.

üß© Web3 Antivirus actualmente soporta Ethereum y protege Metamask, Coinbase Wallet y BitKeep Wallet, mientras que otras billeteras criptogr√°ficas se a√±aden regularmente.

üîíWeb3 Antivirus no tiene acceso a tus fondos y nunca solicita tu frase de recuperaci√≥n u otra informaci√≥n personal.

üîç Transparencia
Esta herramienta de seguridad para billeteras es de c√≥digo abierto e invitamos a los usuarios a revisar nuestro repositorio de GitHub:
https://github.com/web3-antivirus/chrome-extension

üîê Privacidad
Ten en cuenta: Web3 Antivirus nunca pedir√° acceso a tu billetera, activos o frase de recuperaci√≥n.

------------------
